Articles.Content:
I'm trying to test my Eve lander, but whenever I edited my ship to Eve orbit(via alt+f12 or hyperedit), I got RUD of my ship, and this doesn't happen if I edited my ship to LKO(still got RUD when I edited my ship to LEO after that), also if I reverted to launch after that, I got an longer than usual loading, and the ship stuck at 91m, also the game lookes really glitched, the camera also froze.

If I loaded another save after the RUD, the camera also froze, and if I edited my ship to Kerbin surface(in the ocean), the ship just sinks down very fast, but if I loaded another save after "landing", the game suddenly has no problems.

If I reverted to VAB after RUD, I got no problems also.

I tried create a new save, close the game, loading my ship into a new save, restart the game, open the new save, then edit it to LEO, then the same happened.

Although the first I edited my ship to Eve(I think via alt+f12, don't remember if I used hyperedit to lower my orbit after that, but probably not), I got some time to open mechjeb and pick a target on the surface, then I saw my orbit change to be a lot more elliptical then back to circular(I was in the map view), then I swiched back and saw the RUD.

My logs:https://www.dropbox.com/sh/guybgji8wxe7qd1/AABeVDT99Xl6h7H4tYuQ-EJga?dl=0

I don't know why I have Kopernicius logs and files that looks like they're form OPM, because I'm on 1.9.1 and I uninstalled these two mods quite a while ago.
